## TextElementsRenderer.waitLoaded() method

Waits till all pending resources from any `FontCatalog` are loaded.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
waitLoaded(): Promise<boolean>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Promise&lt;boolean&gt;
